main event: An unusual flying object was reported moving rapidly in a zigzag course and disappearing quickly.
interesting points: The object was described as distinct, light in color, and slightly larger than a star or satellite., The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes., Observers noted that it was not a meteor, star, or satellite., The object appeared to be falling in flames and was viewed through the windshield of a car., The analysis characterized the sighting as a bright meteor based on speed and movement.
witness description: Design engineer, reported seeing the object moving westward at a 75-degree angle.
